overview: A woman's lingerie says a lot about her, at least according to the author of this confession. Is his neighbor provoking him with all those lace bras and delicate panties? One day a piece of lingerie falls down to his patio. Is it an accident, or has she done it on purpose? The only way to figure it out is bringing the panties back to her. This is the story of two neighbors and a drying rack...
tagline: From the XConfessions series: A woman's lingerie can say a lot about her - and about her neighbour.
title: La Reine des Culottes
